channel.title: [pi] fitting a crown to a rank
channel.description: ok i made a donator rank and ive searched in client hacking and client help section and in r-s tuts i cannot find out how to put a crown on a rank. i alreaady have the sprite for the crown but how do i make it so when they talk it shows up beside there name??
